Package padsof

Class Offer

  • java.lang.Object
    • padsof.Offer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Long, Short

    public abstract class Offer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Alejandro Santorum and David Cabornero This class allows us to create new offers, modify and get its attributes (like the price or the apartment offered) or change its state (booked, rented, free...)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Offer

        public Offer​(float price,
             Apartment apartment,
             RegisteredUser owner)
      throws UserException
        This constructor creates a new offer
        Parameters:
        price - Price of the offer
        apartment - Apartment to be offered
        owner - Landlord who is going to offer the apartment
        Throws:
        UserException - this user cannot offer

        This getter gives the price of the offer

        the price

        public Status getStatus​()
        This getter gives the status of the offer (rented, booked...)
        Returns:
        the status

      • getApartment

        public Apartment getApartment​()
        This getter gives the apartment offered
        Returns:
        the apartment

      • getOwner

        public RegisteredUser getOwner​()
        This getter gives the Landlord who did the offer
        Returns:
        the owner of the offer's apartment.

      • getDemander

        public RegisteredUser getDemander​()
        This getter gives the Renter who booked or rented the offer
        Returns:
        the client(demander) of the offer.

      • getComments

        This getter gives the array of comments of the offer
        Returns:
        The array of comments

        public float getRatingMedia​()
        This getter gives the media of the numerical comments
        Returns:
        The media of ratings

      • getOfferType

        public abstract OfferType getOfferType​()
        This function gives the type of stay (short or long)
        Returns:
        The type of stay

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus​(Status status)
        This setter allows to set the status of the offer (free, rented, booked...)
        Parameters:
        status - the status to set

      • setDemander

        public void setDemander​(RegisteredUser demander)
        This setter allows to set the Renter who is going to rent or book the offer
        Parameters:
        demander - the demander to set

      • unsetDemander

        public void unsetDemander​()
        This function initializes the demander to null. It happens when, for example, the time of booking expires.

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice​(float price)
        This setter allows to set a new price
        Parameters:
        price - The new price

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        This toString returns the price of the offer, the status (free, booked...) the data of the apartment and the nick of the demander.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • equals

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean equals​(Offer off)

      • bookOffer

        public void bookOffer​(RegisteredUser user)
               throws UserException,
                      OfferException
        This function allows to book the offer
        Parameters:
        user - The renter who is going to book the offer
        Throws:
        UserException - this user cannot book or it is blocked
        OfferException - this offer cannot be booked right now

      • rentOffer

        public void rentOffer​(RegisteredUser user)
               throws OfferException,
                      UserException,
                      es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.OrderRejectedException
        This function allows to rent an offer
        Parameters:
        user - The renter who is going to rent the offer
        Throws:
        OfferException - this offer cannot be rented right now
        UserException - this user is blocked or it cannot rent right now
        es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.OrderRejectedException - the credit card number is wrong or the internet connection failed

      • commentOffer

        public void commentOffer​(Commentary comment)
                  throws OfferException
        This function allows to add a new comment to the offer
        Parameters:
        comment - Comment to be added to the list of comments.
        Throws:
        OfferException - this offer cannot be commented right now
